Player History
Released by San Francisco on 4/1/1968...
Drafted in 1st round, 19th overall pick, by Boston in 1972...
Traded from Boston to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1973 (Going to CHC: P E. Halicki. Going to BOS: P L. Lagrow, P T. Wilshusen, 1B B. Davis)...
Released by Chicago (N) on 8/28/1973...
Signed as a free agent by California on 8/28/1973 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 8/8/1976 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/8/1979 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 8/25/1979 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/30/1980...
Injured on 6/1/1981 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 6-7 weeks...
Drafted in 2nd round, 23rd overall pick, by Baltimore in 1985...
Injured on 8/9/1985 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1989, off Dennis Eckersley (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/20/1989, off Atlee Hammaker (CLE)...
Injured on 7/19/1989 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/2/1996 with a Torn Calf Muscle, out for full season...
